## Properties

| Property    | Attribute    | Description         | Type                  | Default     |
| ----------- | ------------ | ------------------- | --------------------- | ----------- |
| `ariaLabel` | `aria-label` |                     | `string`              | `undefined` |
| `fullWidth` | `full-width` |                     | `boolean`             | `false`     |
| `size`      | `size`       |                     | `"medium" \| "small"` | `'medium'`  |
| `tabs`      | --           | The tabs to render. | `Tab[]`               | `[]`        |

| Event       | Description                        | Type                  |
| ----------- | ---------------------------------- | --------------------- |
